about_the_game: Embark on an auditory journey through the magical farm of Everdream Valley with the captivating soundtrack made by Michał Jaskuła. Immerse yourself in the melodic wonders accompanying your farming adventure and experience the enchantment of the valley through its mesmerizing music. The soundtrack contains 11 tracks to relax you as you cultivate your homestead, tend to your crops, and pet cute animals!
detailed_description: Embark on an auditory journey through the magical farm of Everdream Valley with the captivating soundtrack made by Michał Jaskuła. Immerse yourself in the melodic wonders accompanying your farming adventure and experience the enchantment of the valley through its mesmerizing music. The soundtrack contains 11 tracks to relax you as you cultivate your homestead, tend to your crops, and pet cute animals!
